verses.verse: Maschil of Ethan the Ezrahite. I will sing<WH7891> of the lovingkindness<WH2617> of Jehovah<WH3068> for ever<WH5769>: With my mouth<WH6310> will I make known<WH3045> thy faithfulness<WH530> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>.
For I have said<WH559>, Mercy<WH2617> shall be built up<WH1129> for ever<WH5769>; Thy faithfulness<WH530> wilt thou establish<WH3559> in the very heavens<WH8064>.
I have made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with my chosen<WH972>, I have sworn<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>:
Thy seed<WH2233> will I establish<WH3559> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>, And build up<WH1129> thy throne<WH3678> to all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>. Selah<WH5542>
And the heavens<WH8064> shall praise<WH3034> thy wonders<WH6382>, O Jehovah<WH3068>; Thy faithfulness<WH530> also in the assembly<WH6951> of the holy ones<WH6918>.
For who in the skies<WH7834> can be compared<WH6186> unto Jehovah<WH3068>? Who among the sons<WH1121> of the mighty<WH410> is like<WH1819> unto Jehovah<WH3068>,
A God<WH410> very<WH7227> terrible<WH6206> in the council<WH5475> of the holy<WH6918> ones<WH3372>, And to be feared above all them that are round about him<WH5439>?
O Jehovah<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, Who is a mighty<WH2626> one<WH3050>, like unto thee, O Jehovah? And thy faithfulness<WH530> is round about thee<WH5439>.
Thou rulest<WH4910> the pride<WH1348> of the sea<WH3220>: When the waves<WH1530> thereof arise<WH7721>, thou stillest them<WH7623>.
Thou hast broken<WH1792> Rahab<WH7294> in pieces<WH1792>, as one that is slain<WH2491>; Thou hast scattered<WH6340> thine enemies<WH341> with the arm<WH2220> of thy strength<WH5797>.
The heavens<WH8064> are thine<WH776>, the earth also is thine<WH8398>: The world and the fulness<WH4393> thereof<WH3245>, thou hast founded them.
The north<WH6828> and the south<WH3225>, thou hast created<WH1254> them<WH8396>: Tabor and Hermon<WH2768> rejoice<WH7442> in thy name<WH8034>.
Thou hast a mighty<WH1369> arm<WH2220>; Strong<WH5810> is thy hand<WH3027>, and high<WH7311> is thy right hand<WH3225>.
Righteousness <WH6664> and justice<WH6664> are the foundation<WH4349> of thy throne<WH3678>: Lovingkindness<WH2617> and truth<WH571> go<WH6923> before thy face<WH6440>.
Blessed <WH835> is the people<WH5971> that know<WH3045> the joyful sound<WH8643>: They walk<WH1980>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, in the light<WH216> of thy countenance<WH6440>.
In thy name<WH8034> do they rejoice<WH1523> all the day<WH3117>; And in thy righteousness<WH6666> are they exalted<WH7311>.
For thou art the glory<WH8597> of their strength<WH5797>; And in thy favor<WH7522> our horn<WH7161> shall be exalted<WH7311>.
For our shield<WH4043> belongeth unto Jehovah<WH3068>; And our king<WH4428> to the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel<WH3478>.

Then thou spakest<WH1696> in vision<WH2377> to thy saints<WH2623>, And saidst<WH559>, I have laid<WH7737> help<WH5828> upon one that is mighty<WH1368>; I have exalted<WH7311> one chosen<WH977> out of the people<WH5971>.
I have found<WH4672> David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650>; With my holy<WH6944> oil<WH8081> have I anointed him<WH4886>:
With whom my hand<WH3027> shall be established<WH3559>; Mine arm<WH2220> also shall strengthen him<WH553>.
The enemy<WH341> shall not exact<WH5378> from him<WH1121>, Nor the son of wickedness<WH5766> afflict him<WH6031>.
And I will beat down<WH3807> his adversaries<WH6862> before him<WH6440>, And smite<WH5062> them that hate him<WH8130>.
But my faithfulness<WH530> and my lovingkindness<WH2617> shall be with him<WH8034>; And in my name shall his horn<WH7161> be exalted<WH7311>.
I will set<WH7760> his hand<WH3027> also on the sea<WH3220>, And his right hand<WH3225> on the rivers<WH5104>.
He shall cry<WH7121> unto me<WH1>, Thou art my Father, My God<WH410>, and the rock<WH6697> of my salvation<WH3444>.
I also will make<WH5414> him my first-born<WH1060>, The highest<WH5945> of the kings<WH4428> of the earth<WH776>.
My lovingkindness<WH2617> will I keep<WH8104> for him for evermore<WH5769>; And my covenant<WH1285> shall stand fast with him<WH539>.
His seed<WH2233> also will I make<WH7760> to endure for ever<WH5703>, And his throne<WH3678> as the days<WH3117> of heaven<WH8064>.
If his children<WH1121> forsake<WH5800> my law<WH8451>, And walk<WH3212> not in mine ordinances<WH4941>;
If they break<WH2490> my statutes<WH2708>, And keep<WH8104> not my commandments<WH4687>;
Then will I visit<WH6485> their transgression<WH6588> with the rod<WH7626>, And their iniquity<WH5771> with stripes<WH5061>.
But my lovingkindness<WH2617> will I not utterly take<WH6331> from him<WH530>, Nor suffer my faithfulness to fail<WH8266>.
My covenant<WH1285> will I not break<WH2490>, Nor alter<WH8138> the thing that is gone out<WH4161> of my lips<WH8193>.
Once <WH259> have I sworn<WH7650> by my holiness<WH6944>: I will not lie<WH3576> unto David<WH1732>:
His seed<WH2233> shall endure for ever<WH5769>, And his throne<WH3678> as the sun before me<WH8121>.
It shall be established<WH3559> for ever<WH5769> as the moon<WH3394>, And as the faithful<WH539> witness<WH5707> in the sky<WH7834>. <WH5542>[[Selah
But thou hast cast off<WH2186> and rejected<WH3988>, Thou hast been wroth<WH5674> with thine anointed<WH4899>.
Thou hast abhorred<WH5010> the covenant<WH1285> of thy servant<WH5650>: Thou hast profaned<WH2490> his crown<WH5145> by casting it to the ground<WH776>.
Thou hast broken down<WH6555> all his hedges<WH1448>; Thou hast brought<WH7760> his strongholds<WH4013> to ruin<WH4288>.
All that pass by<WH5674> the way<WH1870> rob<WH8155> him<WH2781>: He is become a reproach to his neighbors<WH7934>.
Thou hast exalted<WH7311> the right hand<WH3225> of his adversaries<WH6862>; Thou hast made all his enemies<WH341> to rejoice<WH8055>.
Yea <WH7725>, thou turnest back the edge<WH6697> of his sword<WH2719>, And hast not made him to stand<WH6965> in the battle<WH4421>.
Thou hast made his brightness<WH2892> to cease<WH7673>, And cast<WH4048> his throne<WH3678> down<WH4048> to the ground<WH776>.
The days<WH3117> of his youth<WH5934> hast thou shortened<WH7114>: Thou hast covered<WH5844> him with shame<WH955>. <WH5542>[[Selah
How long<WH3068>, O Jehovah? wilt thou hide<WH5641> thyself for ever<WH5331>? How long shall thy wrath<WH2534> burn<WH1197> like fire<WH784>?
Oh remember<WH2142> how short<WH2465> my time is<WH7723>: For what vanity hast thou created all the children<WH1121> of men<WH1121>!
What man<WH1397> is he that shall live<WH2421> and not see<WH7200> death<WH4194>, That shall deliver<WH4422> his soul<WH5315> from the power<WH3027> of Sheol<WH7585>? <WH5542>[[Selah
Lord <WH136>, where are thy former<WH7223> lovingkindnesses<WH2617>, Which thou swarest<WH7650> unto David<WH1732> in thy faithfulness<WH530>?
Remember <WH2142>, Lord<WH136>, the reproach<WH2781> of thy servants<WH5650>; How I do bear<WH5375> in my bosom<WH2436> the reproach of all the mighty<WH7227> peoples<WH5971>,
Wherewith thine enemies<WH341> have reproached<WH2778>, O Jehovah<WH3068>, Wherewith they have reproached<WH2778> the footsteps<WH6119> of thine anointed<WH4899>.
Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068> for evermore<WH5769>. Amen<WH543>, and Amen<WH543>.
